email sent when online app status equals audit complete
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Audit Complete") && Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKrAAM" && Offer__c <> "a3L700000002GaB" && Offer__c <> "a3L70000000koW8" && NOT(CONTAINS(Application_Title__c, "rts"))

rules.description: Bring over the email address from the associated Offer for the partner group
sent when online app status equals cards shipped
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Cards Shipped"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Cards Produced") ), Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKr", Number_of_Cards_Needed__c >= 1, Offer__c <> "a3L700000002GaB", Offer__c <> "a3L70000000koW8" )

rules.fullName: Corecard Edgecard Audit Complete Email Alert
rules.description: Welcome email sent when online app offer = Edgecard and Status = Cards Produced
rules.formula: Offer__c = "a3L700000002GaB" && ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Cards Produced")

rules.description: email is sent to when app status = decisioned
sent when online app status equals saved incomplete and offer does not equal edgecard
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Saved-Incomplete") && Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKr" && Offer__c <> "a3L700000002GaB"

rules.description: sent when online app status equals saved incomplete and offer equals edgecard
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Saved-Incomplete") && Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKr" && Offer__c = "a3L700000002GaB"

rules.description: sent when online app status equals cards shipped and offer equals edgecard
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Cards Shipped") && Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKr" && Number_of_Cards_Needed__c >= 1 && Offer__c = "a3L700000002GaB"

rules.description: sent when online app status equals "Approved-Requested" OR "Approved-Counter Offer" OR "Approved-Secured Requested" and offer equals edgecard
rules.formula: OR(ISPICKVAL(Credit_Decision__c ,"Approved-Requested"), ISPICKVAL(Credit_Decision__c ,"Approved-Counter Offer"), ISPICKVAL(Credit_Decision__c ,"Approved-Secured Requested")) && Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKr" && Offer__c = "a3L700000002GaB"

rules.description: sent when online app status equals "Declined" and offer equals edgecard
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Credit_Decision__c ,"Declined")&& Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKr" && Offer__c = "a3Le00000006kbP" && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Decisioned')

rules.description: sent when online app status equals "Declined-Prepay/Secured Only" and offer equals edgecard
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Credit_Decision__c ,'Declined-Prepay/Secured Only') && Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKr" && Offer__c = "a3Le00000006kbP" && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Decisioned')

rules.description: Assign to JB Hunt Implementation Queue

rules.fullName: LLC Edgecard Audit Complete Email Alert
rules.description: Welcome email sent when online app offer = Edgecard and Status = Cards Produced
rules.formula: Offer__c = "a3L0g000000HJ7g" && ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Cards Produced") && $User.Id = '00570000005FfZv'

rules.fullName: Move To Cards Produced After LLC Integration Complete
rules.formula: AND($User.Id = '00570000005FfZv', OR( PRIORVALUE( AR_ID_Number__c) == null, PRIORVALUE( Carrier_ID_Number__c) == null ), Carrier_ID_Number__c != null, AR_ID_Number__c != null )

rules.description: automatic email to be triggered once their Online Application status is changed to “Implementation”
Notify XPO Logistics when new Online Application has been created.

criteriaItems.value: Executed and Invalid Signer,Executed and Received

rules.description: When eSignature Status is Executive and Received, or "Executed and Invalid Signer" send an email notice to the application owner.
Change Offer Name WF TXT of Online App based on the Offer Name.

rules.fullName: Online Application - Notify OTR IS Rep Of Round Robin Assignment
rules.formula: AND( CreatedBy.Alias = "guest", Owner:User.UserRole.Name = "OTR IS Sales Inbound" )

rules.description: email sent when online app status equals audit complete for RTS Apps
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Audit Complete") && Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e70000000xEKrAAM" && Offer__c <> "a3L700000002GaB" && CONTAINS(Application_Title__c, "rts")

rules.fullName: Set Owner to OTR IS APPs 1%262 Truck Queue
rules.description: Set Owner to OTR IS APPs 1&2 Truck Queue when TRUE. This is used for Round Robin distribution of Online Applications.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Number_of_Trucks__c)), Number_of_Trucks__c < 3, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "App-Incomplete")), OR( CreatedById = '00570000002S3Sl', CreatedById = '00570000003hCBt' ), OR( Owner:User.Id = '00570000002S3Sl', Owner:User.Id = '00570000003hCBt' ), OR( Offer__r.Name = 'WEX Fleet One All Roads', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One LLC Edge BOCA', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One EDGE', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One Edge Over The Road', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One Edge LLC BOCA SG' ) )

rules.fullName: Set Owner to OTR IS APPs Queue
rules.description: Set Owner to OTR IS APPs Queue when TRUE. This is used for Round Robin distribution of Online Applications.
rules.formula:
AND(
Number_of_Trucks__c <= 50, Number_of_Trucks__c >= 3, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "App-Incomplete")),
OR( CreatedById = '00570000002S3Sl', CreatedById = '00570000003hCBt' ),
OR( Owner:User.Id = '00570000002S3Sl', Owner:User.Id = '00570000003hCBt' ),
OR( Offer__r.Name = 'WEX Fleet One All Roads', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One LLC Edge BOCA', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One EDGE', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One Edge Over The Road', Offer__r.Name = 'Fleet One Edge LLC BOCA SG' )
)
and( Number_of_Cards_Needed__c > 0, or( includes(Other_Services__c, "ATM & PlusCheks"), includes(Other_Services__c, "PlusCheks Only") ))

rules.description: When Billing Frequency = PrePay, set Credit Limit to PrePay

rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Address_Verification_Source__c, "BizID-Pass")&& Offer__r.Name = "Fuelbook Select"

rules.fullName: Update Status Decisioned to Pending Setup
rules.description: If all these fields are complete the status will change to Pending Setup.
rules.formula:
AND(
(OR(Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Requested', Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Counter Accepted', Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Secured Accepted' )),
Text(Status__c) = 'Decisioned', not(ISBLANK(Offer__c )), not(ISBLANK( Text(Product_Type__c))), not(ISBLANK(Credit_Line_Approved__c)), not(ISBLANK(Legal_Business_Name__c)), not(ISBLANK(Business_Street_Address__c)), not(ISBLANK(City__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(State__c))), not(ISBLANK(Zip_Code__c)), not(ISBLANK(Email__c)), not(ISBLANK(Contact_Name__c)), not(ISBLANK(Phone_Number__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(Billing_Cycle__c))), not(ISBLANK(Text(Payment_Method__c))), not(ISBLANK(Day_of_Payment__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(Invoice_Delivery_Method__c))), not(ISBLANK(Invoice_Delivery_Method_Email__c)), not(ISBLANK(Financial_Institution__c)), not(ISBLANK(Branch_Phone_Number__c)), not(ISBLANK(Branch_City__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(Branch_State__c))), Driver_Setup_Count__c >0, not(ISBLANK(AO_Name__c)), not(ISBLANK(AO_Address__c)), not(ISBLANK(AO_City__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(AO_State__c))), not(ISBLANK(AO_Zip_Code__c)), or(Unit__c=FALSE, and(Unit__c=TRUE, Unit_Count__c > 0))
)

rules.fullName: Update Status Decisioned to Pending Setup Data
rules.description: If any of these fields is blank or not complete the status will change to Pending Setup Data.
rules.formula:
and(
AND( Text(Status__c) = 'Decisioned', (OR(Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Requested', Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Counter Accepted', Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Secured Accepted' )),
(or(
ISBLANK(Offer__c ), ISBLANK( Text(Product_Type__c)), ISBLANK(Credit_Line_Approved__c), ISBLANK(Legal_Business_Name__c), ISBLANK(Business_Street_Address__c), ISBLANK(City__c), ISBLANK(Text(State__c)), ISBLANK(Zip_Code__c), ISBLANK(Email__c), ISBLANK(Contact_Name__c), ISBLANK(Phone_Number__c), ISBLANK(Text(Billing_Cycle__c)), ISBLANK(Text(Payment_Method__c)), ISBLANK(Day_of_Payment__c), ISBLANK(Text(Invoice_Delivery_Method__c)), ISBLANK(Invoice_Delivery_Method_Email__c), ISBLANK(Financial_Institution__c), ISBLANK(Branch_Phone_Number__c), ISBLANK(Branch_City__c), ISBLANK(Text(Branch_State__c)), ISBLANK(AO_Name__c), ISBLANK(AO_Address__c), ISBLANK(AO_City__c), ISBLANK(Text(AO_State__c)), ISBLANK(AO_Zip_Code__c), Driver_Setup_Count__c =0, and(Unit__c=TRUE,Unit_Count__c = 0)
) ) ))

rules.fullName: Update Status from Pending Setup Data to Pending Setup
rules.description: If all these fields are complete the status will change to Pending Setup.
rules.formula:
AND(
(OR(Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Requested', Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Counter Accepted', Text(Credit_Decision__c) = 'Approved-Secured Accepted' )),
Text(Status__c) = 'Pending Setup Data', Credit_Line_Approved__c>0, not(ISBLANK(Offer__c )), not(ISBLANK( Text(Product_Type__c))), not(ISBLANK(Legal_Business_Name__c)), not(ISBLANK(Business_Street_Address__c)), not(ISBLANK(City__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(State__c))), not(ISBLANK(Zip_Code__c)), not(ISBLANK(Email__c)), not(ISBLANK(Contact_Name__c)), not(ISBLANK(Phone_Number__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(Billing_Cycle__c))), not(ISBLANK(Text(Payment_Method__c))), not(ISBLANK(Day_of_Payment__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(Invoice_Delivery_Method__c))), not(ISBLANK(Invoice_Delivery_Method_Email__c)), not(ISBLANK(Financial_Institution__c)), not(ISBLANK(Branch_Phone_Number__c)), not(ISBLANK(Branch_City__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(Branch_State__c))), Driver_Setup_Count__c >0, not(ISBLANK(AO_Name__c)), not(ISBLANK(AO_Address__c)), not(ISBLANK(AO_City__c)), not(ISBLANK(Text(AO_State__c))), not(ISBLANK(AO_Zip_Code__c)), or(Unit__c=FALSE, and(Unit__c=TRUE, Unit_Count__c > 0))
)

rules.fullName: clear In Progress when Status changes
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Status__c)
